A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Completely ignores what came before and disappoints those of us that have been waiting for 30 years for this. Looks like JJ and Rian are in completely different universes. Such a huge disappointment in adding an important chapter to this saga\, for those of you that have kept the flame alive for all of us and new generations this long I am truly sorry and what a horrible entry. What was the point of Force Awakens with this movie? Simply horrible.
